pages.text: $(item)Peridot$() is an intensely curious gem, one whose properties continue to elude me.$(br2)While wearing a set of peridot armor, any sort of violence afflicted upon me seems to $(thing)mellow the attacker$(), giving me an opportunity to get out of harmâ€™s way.

It also seems to improve my prospecting skills, allowing me to $(thing)extract more precious material$() from the ores I mine.$(br2)I can't seem to grasp what could be providing this power of fortune, but this material seems.... friendly. Reluctant to harm others but willing to give instead. It almost feels less like a mineral from the depths, and more like an entity watching over me and ensuring my well being.
